label.name: Install R, RStudio, R-Instat pour la prochaine sea...
label.intro:
Install R, RStudio, R-Instat pour la prochaine seance

If you are comfortable writing code, you may use R/RStudio. Otherwise, feel free to use R-Instat. Both will be supported.

To download R-Instat, go to https://r-instat.org/Download.html
